section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
We belong to the following associations: 
* at Belgian level:  
Fédération des Industries du Verre, (FIV) 
fédération des producteurs de matériaux de construction (PMC) 
* at international level: 
Glass for Europe 
Glass Alliance Europe 
Construction Products Europe
goals__remit: We are producers of flat glass for use in buildings and in automotive industry. We also transform this basic glass into coated glass for solar control and for enhanced thermal insulation, into double or triple glazing, laminated glass for safety or acoustic insulation, toughened glass for safety or reinforced mechanical properties, etc.
